prompt:
Create 4 prompts for a cohesive, chronologically flowing thinking-of-you greeting card that tells a visual story (9:16 ratio):

ðŸŽ¨ CREATIVITY MANDATE: Be genuinely creative, unique, and innovative! Avoid generic or clichÃ© designs. Think outside the box, surprise with unexpected elements, use bold artistic choices, and create something truly memorable and special. Push creative boundaries while staying appropriate for the card type and tone.

Theme: "Sending you all our love from Silao y US, and sending you the pictures from the hummingbirds. congratulations on finishing your orchid Lego set. Must be in Spanish and light humor "
Style: ðŸŽ¨ Watercolor
Tone: ðŸ˜„ Funny - humorous and lighthearted
To: TÃ­a Chivis
From: Fam Hdez Ag
Message: "[Blank space for handwritten message]"
Note: Include space for handwritten message


CRITICAL: Create a cohesive visual narrative that flows chronologically through the card experience:
1. FRONT COVER: First impression - sets the scene/introduces the story
2. INTERIOR SPREAD: The heart of the experience - continuation and climax of the visual story
3. BACK COVER: Conclusion - peaceful resolution or complementary ending

Requirements:
- Flat 2D artwork for printing (not 3D card images)
- Full-bleed backgrounds extending to edges
- IMPORTANT: Keep text, faces, and key elements at least 10% away from top/bottom edges (small amount may be cropped in printing)
- Keep text/faces 0.5" from left/right edges for safe printing
- CONSISTENT visual elements throughout: same characters, color palette, lighting, art style
- Progressive visual storytelling from front â†’ interior â†’ back
- Put any text in quotes and make it clear/readable
- Each section should feel like part of the same artistic universe
- TONE: Ensure the visual mood and atmosphere matches the humorous and lighthearted tone throughout all sections
- INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY SAFETY: If the user mentions specific characters, brands, logos, or products, automatically replace them with original generic alternatives in your prompts. For example: replace specific character names with "cartoon mouse character" or "superhero character", replace brand names with "colorful cereal" or "sports car", etc. Create inspired-by designs that capture the essence without referencing any protected names or specific copyrighted elements. Never include actual brand names, character names, or trademarked terms in the image generation prompts
- CONTENT SAFETY: Ensure all prompts are family-friendly and appropriate for greeting cards. Avoid any content that could be flagged by safety systems including: violence, weapons, inappropriate imagery, political content, controversial topics, scary or disturbing elements, or anything not suitable for all ages. If the user requests something potentially inappropriate, redirect to positive, wholesome alternatives that capture their intent in a family-friendly way
- Include visual humor, playful elements, and whimsical details







Create prompts that flow chronologically:

1. Front Cover (Opening Scene): BE GENUINELY CREATIVE AND UNIQUE! Include "thinking-of-you" greeting text positioned safely in the center area (avoid top/bottom 10% of image). TEXT STYLE: Write the greeting text in beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script that matches the elegant style used inside the card - legible, flowing, and graceful with natural character and warmth. Create charming cartoon-style or stylized illustrated figures if people are needed for the theme. This is the story opening - introduce key visual elements (colors, motifs, artistic style) that will continue throughout the other sections. Think of something unexpected, innovative, and memorable that will surprise and delight the recipient. Avoid generic designs! Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

2. Left Interior (Story Development): UNLEASH YOUR CREATIVITY! You have complete creative freedom to design whatever you want for this left interior page! This is your artistic playground - create something genuinely innovative and unexpected that feels right for a thinking-of-you card with humorous and lighthearted tone. You can include: scenes, landscapes, objects, patterns, quotes, text, illustrations, realistic art, abstract art, or anything else that inspires you - but NO PEOPLE or characters unless the user specifically mentioned wanting people in their card description. Position any text safely in center area (avoid top/bottom 10%). Think of something no one has done before! Surprise us with bold, imaginative, and memorable artistic choices while maintaining visual harmony with the overall card style and tone. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

3. Right Interior (Story Climax): BE CREATIVE WITH MESSAGE DESIGN! Design with elegant writing space that complements the visual story from left interior. Position decorative elements safely away from top/bottom edges. Create innovative and artistic decorative elements, borders, or flourishes that are unique and memorable - NO PEOPLE or characters. This should feel like the emotional peak of the card experience, harmonizing with the left interior as a cohesive spread. Avoid clichÃ© designs and create something genuinely special! Use the elegant cursive handwriting style described above. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

4. Back Cover (Story Resolution): BE SUBTLY CREATIVE! Create a simple yet innovative decorative design that brings peaceful closure to the visual story. Reference subtle elements from the front cover but keep it minimal and serene - NO PEOPLE, just beautiful, unexpected artistic elements that go beyond typical patterns or florals. IMPORTANT: Leave the bottom-right corner area (approximately 1 inch square) completely clear and undecorated - this space is reserved for a QR code. Focus decorative elements toward the center and left side of the design. Think of something quietly beautiful and memorable that complements the overall design while being genuinely unique. This should feel like a peaceful, artistic ending that surprises with its subtle creativity. Style: in watercolor painting style, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds

VISUAL CONTINUITY CHECKLIST:
- Same color palette across all sections
- Consistent lighting/time of day
- Same artistic techniques and brushwork
- Recurring visual motifs or symbols (but make them unique and memorable!)
- Progressive emotional journey from introduction to resolution
- Front cover: stylized cartoon/illustrated characters if people are needed for the theme
- Left interior: CREATIVE FREEDOM but NO PEOPLE unless user specifically requested people in their description
- Right interior: focus on message space with innovative decorative elements (NO PEOPLE)
- Back cover: simple yet creative decorative design without text or people
- Use simplified, friendly, charming character design if including people (front cover only)
- CREATIVITY PRIORITY: Always choose the more innovative, surprising, and memorable option over generic designs

Return JSON:
{
  "frontCover": "detailed prompt with story opening elements",
  "backCover": "detailed prompt with story conclusion elements",
  "leftInterior": "detailed prompt with story development elements",
  "rightInterior": "detailed prompt with story climax elements"
}

IMPORTANT: Create a completely unique and different interpretation for this specific card variant. Use different creative approaches, color schemes, compositions, and artistic elements while maintaining the same core theme and requirements.

generatedPrompts.frontCover:
```json
{
  "frontCover": "Front cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, rendered in a charming watercolor painting style. The background is a soft gradient from yellow at the top to light blue at the bottom, with scattered fluffy white clouds. Centered prominently is a large, outlined heart shape in a warm orange hue. Inside the heart, in an elegant, flowing handwritten cursive script, is the text \"Pensando en ti, Tia Chivis\". Positioned on the left side, within the lower half of the card, is a stylized cartoon hummingbird depicted in vibrant green, playing a ukulele. On the right side, mirroring the hummingbird's position, is another stylized cartoon hummingbird, also in green, wearing a brown cowboy hat and holding a tin can to its beak, as if speaking through a homemade telephone. Connecting these two hummingbirds is a stylized, playful orange string, forming loops. Below the hummingbirds, the map of Mexico, specifically highlighting the area of Silao, is shown in a bright green watercolor wash on the left. On the right, the United States is depicted in a blue watercolor wash. The overall mood is lighthearted, humorous, and whimsical, with soft, blended colors and visible brushstrokes characteristic of watercolor art. The text is clear and readable, with safe margins from the edges.",
  "backCover": "Back cover of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, continuing the charming watercolor painting style. The background is a soft, blended wash of yellow and light blue, mirroring the sky from the front cover. A single, stylized fluffy white cloud is visible in the upper left portion. In the center and slightly to the left, a subtle, abstract design features a few delicate, looping tendrils in a soft orange watercolor, reminiscent of the connecting string from the front cover, but more subdued. The focus is on serene, artistic decoration with no text or people. A small, approximate 1-inch square area in the bottom right corner is completely clear and undecorated, reserved for a QR code. The artistic elements are minimal and peaceful, creating a sense of gentle conclusion.",
  "leftInterior": "Left interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, rendered in a consistent charming watercolor painting style. The background is a soft, warm gradient transitioning from yellow at the top to a pale, earthy green at the bottom, evoking a sunny landscape. In the center of the image, two stylized cartoon hummingbirds are depicted in mid-air. The hummingbird on the left, in vibrant green, is shown in profile, looking towards the right, with its wings outstretched and body angled slightly downwards. It appears to be chirping or singing with a joyful expression. The hummingbird on the right, also in green, is facing the left, with its wings also spread. It is holding a delicate, unfinished Lego orchid piece in its beak, looking slightly proud and accomplished. The background features subtle watercolor washes and soft brush strokes, with a few small, light clouds scattered throughout the yellow upper section. The overall scene conveys a sense of playful celebration and accomplishment, fitting the humorous and lighthearted tone.",
  "rightInterior": "Right interior of a greeting card with a 9:16 aspect ratio, continuing the charming watercolor painting style. The background features a serene watercolor wash of soft yellows and greens, with a gentle, subtle pattern of delicate watercolor flower petals in light pink and white scattered across the surface. This area is designed to provide ample writing space. In the upper center, elegantly positioned within the safe zone, is a decorative flourish in a flowing, cursive handwritten script, reading \"Â¡Felicidades por tu Lego de orquÃ­deas!\". The overall design is clean and artistic, with a focus on providing a beautiful and complementary space for a handwritten message, harmonizing with the visual story of the other card sections."
}
```

generatedPrompts.backCover: Back cover design for a greeting card with a minimalist yet evocative watercolor aesthetic. The background features a soft, blended wash of pale yellow and sky blue, creating a serene and airy atmosphere. A delicate, thin twine winds across the upper half of the image, starting from the right and curving gently towards the left. At the end of the twine, on the left side of the image, are two small, stylized feathers, one in a soft blue transitioning to yellow, and the other a solid blue, painted with subtle brushstrokes that suggest movement and lightness. The overall composition is sparse, with the focal elements of the twine and feathers placed artfully against the textured watercolor paper. There is no text or explicit design for a QR code area, allowing for maximum creative interpretation and a sense of peaceful, open resolution to the card's visual narrative. The style is consistent with delicate watercolor painting, featuring soft edges, subtle color blending, and a general impression of understated elegance and whimsy, providing a quiet and beautiful conclusion.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: Left interior page of a greeting card with a whimsical watercolor illustration featuring four stylized hummingbirds in a grassy, sun-dappled meadow dotted with small, vibrant watercolor flowers in shades of pink, orange, and yellow. The background is a soft wash of pale blue and yellow, evoking a bright, cheerful day. In the upper left, a hummingbird wearing a small purple beret and holding a paintbrush in its beak appears to be painting an orange flower. To its right, another hummingbird is in mid-flight, holding an orange flower with its beak. In the lower left, a third hummingbird with a comically surprised expression stands on the ground, wings slightly spread. In the lower right, a fourth hummingbird is operating an antique-style camera on a tripod, with a length of vintage film unspooling dramatically onto the ground in front of it. The film is rendered with textured details, suggesting a narrative unfolding. The overall impression is one of playful activity and a storytelling theme, executed in a charming, slightly abstract watercolor style with visible brushstrokes and soft paint bleeds, maintaining a humorous and lighthearted tone.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: Right interior page of a greeting card designed for message space with a whimsical watercolor illustration of an orchid constructed from building blocks. The orchid, rendered in vibrant teal, pink, and orange hues, is the focal point, dominating the right side of the page. Delicate, pale green vines with subtle watercolor speckles in yellow and blue arch gracefully from the upper left corner, framing the open space. Below the orchid, the text "Con cariÃ±o, Fam Hdez Ag" is written in an elegant, flowing black cursive script. Further down, a congratulatory message in the same cursive script reads "Â¡Felicidades por terminar tu orquÃ­dea de bloques!". Below this, another line of cursive text states "Con cariÃ±o, por terminar tu orquÃ­dea" leading to a clear blank space indicated for a handwritten message, also in a similar cursive style. The background is a soft, creamy off-white with subtle watercolor paper texture and faint paint splatters, enhancing the artistic feel. The overall impression is lighthearted and celebratory, with a clear division between the decorative floral elements and the ample writing space.
